meanings.sent1: The lymphangiographic test helped the doctor see the lymphatic system clearly.
meanings.sent2: The lymphangiographic procedure provided detailed images of the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent3: During the lymphangiographic scan, the patient felt like a human map being explored.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a lymphangiographic camera, capturing every detail of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent5: The lymphangiographic description painted a vivid picture of the lymphatic vessels.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the imaging of lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent1: The lymphangiographic images showed the doctor the structure of the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent2: She studied the lymphangiographic pictures to understand the lymphatic system better.
meanings.sent3: The artist's interpretation of the lymphangiographic visuals was truly unique.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had a lymphangiographic quality, seeing beyond the surface to the deeper layers.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the lymphangiographic illustration made the vessels stand out.

meanings.definition: A procedure used to visualize lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent1: The lymphangiographic was scheduled to examine the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent2: After the lymphangiographic, the doctor could see the blockage in the vessels.
meanings.sent3: The patient joked that the lymphangiographic made their insides look like a maze.
meanings.sent4: The lymphangiographic acted as a detective, uncovering the secrets of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the lymphangiographic amazed everyone in the medical team.
